title: Case-Based PBL Program for Enhancing Safety Decision-Making Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic safety management concepts and foundational knowledge of educational design
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, practical application assessment through project outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three risk factors by analyzing real-world industrial accident cases
Learners can form PBL teams to design accident prevention strategies and simulate decision-making processes
Learners can create and pitch safety improvement proposals using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
